metadata.title: CVE-2025-0395 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: When the assert() function in the GNU C Library versions 2.13 to 2.40fails, it does not allocate enough space for the assertion failure messagestring and size information, which may lead to a buffer overflow if themessage string size aligns to page size.

criterions.comment: glibc package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
